original_title: George Carlin: Jammin' in New York
overview: When George Carlin is asked which HBO concert is his favorite, his answer is always, "Jamminâ€™ In New York." The show, taped at the Paramount Theater in Madison Square Garden and winner of the 1992 CableACE Award, is a perfect blend of biting social commentary and more gently-observed observational pieces.
title: George Carlin: Jammin' in New York
